text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Mansoura |other_name = |native_name = |nickname = Pearl of the Delta |settlement_type = |motto = |image_skyline = Sunset in Mansoura.JPG |imagesize = 300px |image_caption = Sunset in Mansoura |image_flag = Governadorat de Daqahliya.png |flag_size = |image_seal = |seal_size = |image_shield = |shield_size = |image_map = |mapsize = |map_caption = |pushpin_map = Egypt |pushpin_label_position = bottom |pushpin_mapsize = 300 |pushpin_map_caption = Location in Egypt |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = Governorate |subdivision_name1 = Dakahlia |subdivision_type2 = |subdivision_name2 = |subdivision_type3 = |subdivision_name3 = | |government_footnotes = |government_type = |leader_title = Governor |leader_name = Ahmed El Sharawy |leader_title1 = |leader_name1 = |established_title = Founded |established_date = 1219 |area_magnitude = |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = 371 |area_land_km2 = |population_as_of =2012 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total =960423 |population_density_km2 =auto |population_density_sq_mi = |population_metro = |population_density_metro_km2 = |population_density_metro_sq_mi = |population_blank1_title =Ethnicities |population_blank1 = |population_density_blank1_km2 = |population_density_blank1_sq_mi = | timezone = EET | utc_offset = +2 |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = 12 |elevation_ft = |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = +(20) 50 |blank_name = |blank_info = |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = Official website |footnotes = }} El-Mansoura () is a city in Egypt. 960,423 people live in it. It is the capital of the Dakahlia Governorate. == Name == Mansoura in Arabic means "victorious". The city's name came from the Egyptian victory at the El Mansoura Battle over Louis IX of France during the Seventh Crusade. == Geography == === Location === Mansoura is on the east bank of the Damietta branch of the Nile. It is about 120 km northeast of Cairo. The town of Talkha is on the other bank of the Nile === Climate === The KÃ¶ppen-Geiger climate classification system classifies its climate as hot desert (BWh). == Clubs == * Gezert Elward Sport Club: It has tennis courts, swimming, gymnastics, squash and social club. * Mansoura Sports Club: It has an official football field. * Mansoura Sports Stadium: It has an official football field, swimming pool, social club and many sports facilities. * The Olympic Village (Mansoura University Stadium) == References == == Other websites == * (Arabic) Official website Category:Cities in Egypt Category:1210s establishments Category:13th-century establishments in Africa Category:Establishments in Egypt
title: Mansoura, Egypt
